thread.title: Mom of boy missing for 2 years shot at father last week; Matthew Carrington still not found
thread.title_full: Mom of boy missing for 2 years shot at father last week; Matthew Carrington still not found

author: Carol Robinson | crobinson@al.com
title: Mom of boy missing for 2 years shot at father last week; Matthew Carrington still not found
text: Andre Richards, retired from the U.S. Army, has legal custody of his 4-year-old son but hasn't seen him in two years. Authorities say the mom and her family have been hiding him. "It's been very hard on him emotionally and financially,'' said Richard's attorney, Virginia Meigs, "and the mother has fought him every way she can."
